nodes.text: Spagga Core, Incorporated was a mining company based in the Minos Cluster. The company mainly mined rare gems for use in blaster weapons. During the height of the Galactic Empire, the company was the center of rumors that they had reserved the exclusive mining rights to an unidentified planet in the Minos Cluster in order to gather Corusca gems. The company's biggest competitor was the Damarind Corporation.
